attributes.additional_details: Taxing people on already taxed money for tips is wrong. The person gifting the tip has already paid tax on their money, a new tax bracket is then worked out for the person receiving the tips which can vary from month to month making the calculations differ resulting in the receiver of a tip having to pay more tax. To tip someone is a personal thing and I believe amongst many others to be taxed on this is criminal.
attributes.background: This law should be scrapped, people shouldn’t have to pay tax on already taxed money.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/712667
